about:
Hello Ill Tell You How I Started Playing Minecraft Get Your PopCorns And Enjoy It :



      One Day I Was Playing A Game Called Habbo ( Large Story ) I Went To Visit My Cousin, I Show Him Habbo And He Told Me That He Had A Similar Game (Minecraft) I Hated It Then One Year Later I Was Searching For A Fun Game I Was Eating A Sandwich (Jam) And I Accidentally Entered On A Page While Searching Games I Saw Nice Game And I Saw Gta San Andreas So I Wanted To Click It   But At The Right Side There Was Minecraft So I Clicked It Accidentally It Started Downloading So I Wanted To See What It Was (Details) So I Created My Account ( Pirate ) Then I Started Playing It (I Am Now An Adict) I Was Searching For A Server And       I Found This One By Accident I Wanted To Put Skywars.com But I Didnt Put The Last Letter ( M ) So I Joined This Server (This Server Old Ip Is Skywars.co) I Met Some  People
And I Saw That I Was, A Noob I Left The Server And I Started In A Factions Server I Went From Almost Getting Kill By 1 Guy To  Kill 30 Diamond Guys All After Me And Me With Nothing...... I Went Back To Here And I Started Playing Now Am Playing In Another Factions But Hear This Now In That Server I Kill 100 Full Diamond Guys With My Hand What Am Going To Make Here? Ill Cause The Server Break?! Be Prepared For My Comeback.

Completed Challenges:

Killed 200 Guys With Full Diamond Armor With My Hand ( Got Kicked For Supposed Hackin.... )

Killed A Guy While Felling From Senex With My Last Arrow 1 Heart 324 Blocks Away.

Making Admins Hate Me Cause Of Supposed Hacking

Being Totally Op

Kilking 3 Guys With Forcefield In A Row.

Kill A Guy With An Egg (Op)

Making A Skybase In Walls Killing All Teams Alone With 16 Eggs


Got All Diamonds On Walls Made Me Full Diamond Armor And Killing All and Last Kill Jumping From A Skybase Hitting A Guy While Felling And Killed Him 1 Sec Before I Hit The Ground.

Broke All Monuments Of All maps In Row Without Dying.



Got TempBanned For Supposed No Knockback Hack.....








Op Wrote All This On My Phone .

Guys This Challenges Are Not Most Of Them In This Server The First Completed Challenge Wasnt On This Server It Was In Factions.
interests: Get A Nice Title In My Name
